comment._content: Beautiful picture. Our designer adapted it to promote an event with arabic writers in refuge here in Norway: www.flickr.com/photos/bergenoff/4909528611/ - Thank you for sharing!

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
I like the way you've walked into the picture, Bergen friends! Best wishes for your event -- we're glad to be a small part of it.
Deb Wythe, Digital Lab
